24g PROTEIN
Fruit

BLUEBERRY PROTEIN OATMEAL

Antioxidant-rich blueberry protein oatmeal. 24g protein with burst of berry flavor.

24g
Protein
340
Calories
10m
Total Time
1
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bowl

Carbs44g
Fat8g
Fiber6g
Sugar14g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 80g rolled oats
  • 240ml milk
  • 100g blueberries
  • 30g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 15g almond butter
  • 10g honey

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Cook

Cook oats in milk with half the blueberries for 4 minutes.

2

Mash

Mash the cooked blueberries into the oats.

3

Cool

Let cool 1-2 minutes.

4

Protein

Stir in protein powder.

5

Top

Add remaining blueberries, almond butter, and honey.

PRO TIPS

ðŸ’¡

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

ðŸ’¡

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

ðŸ’¡

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
